Computer Scientist

VPN Server

I set up a VPN server using a raspberry pi connected to my home network. This allowed me to work on my website (see below) from outside the house without allowing public ssh access to the web server. It should also come in handy for many other uses, such as providing more secure internet access in public places.

Website

This website was initially created to store a public listing of the projects I was working on. A nice side effect is that it gave me the opportunity to work with lots of new technologies and frameworks that I had wanted to play with, such as angular and grunt.

Backup Server

I'd really like to write some simple backup software that's easy to use and just works. It needs to be continuous and have incremental daily and monthly backups.
